node.title: Tahini, Date & Cacao Cookies
node.introduction: Nothing beats a cuppa and a bit of homemaking! These cookies are super delicious and a good source of protein, fibre and energy giving B vitamins.

node.title: Pecan Banana Bread
node.introduction: It's super filling and packed full of good fats which will keep you full and stabilise blood sugar especially important for people with type 2 and pre diabetes. Great for breakfast or as an afternoon snack.

node.title: Carrot cake overnight oats
node.introduction: A great alternative to traditional porridge. A perfect ready made breakfast, that will keep you feeling full all morning.

node.title: Oral health and overall health
node.introduction: How much do you know? Maybe you haven't given it much thought, after all who thinks that joint pain, confusion or heart health is related to their mouth. Surprisingly it is!

node.title: Dogs and Gut Health
node.introduction: If you have a dog, ask yourself this question. Why did you make the decision to get him or her?

node.cover_image_alt: Photo of a puppy.  We all love a puppy.

node.text: Looks like someone wants a bit of my lunch!! This is a nod to one of the things my mum @karen4547jones used to make. We called it kedgeree! Don't think it was anything like a kedgeree other than the kippers 😂 Anyway my version has peppered mackerel lots of parsley and rocket, some yummy radishes, plus the tomatoes, eggs and brown rice from my mum's version. One of my favourite lunches! @bj_vegan can you remember it? #glutenfree #dairyfree #kedgereebowl #kedgeree #feedthemicrobiome #nutritionaltherapy #nutrionallybalanced #nutrition #memorylane #childhoodeats #lockdownlunches #feelgoodfoodie #fiveaday #eattherainbow #homemadelunch #pomeranianlove #pomeranian #rebalancingyou #innerpeace

Lunch is served! My favourite type of food. A kinda pick & mix meze. Beetroot & feta salad, cucumber with dill, juicy beef tomatoes with basil and EV olive oil, olives, pimped up houmous and quick and easy gluten free buckwheat flatbread. Enjoyed outside in the ☀️☀️☀️#5aday #fiveaday #feedthemicrobiome #glutenfree #plantbssed #plantpower #thegutmicrobiome #lunchoutside #rebalancingyou #homemadelunch #flatbread #meze #pickandmix #lockdownlunches #healthylifestyle #healthychoices #nutrition #nutrionallybalanced

Lunch today was this amazing warm black rice noodle salad 🥗 with avocado, cherry toms,  rocket, green chilli and fresh walnut pesto I sprinkled over some pistachios and nigella seeds for a bit of crunch. 
Kiind of a take on the one we made a few years back @bj_vegan 😎
#feelgoodfoodie #plantpower #plantbssed #glutenfree #glutenfreeeats #homemadelunch #eattherainbow #dairyfree #saladrecipe #fiveaday #feedthemicrobiome #thegutmicrobiome #rebalancingyou #lockdownlunches

metadata.siteDescription: ENERGISE, RESTORE, NOURISH. I'm studying with the renowned Institute for Optimum Nutrition and will qualify next year. Until then, this is a place to inspire and share healthful information, tips, tricks and recipes. I hope to energise, restore and nourish your body mind and soul!
